item.title: Fact-Checking the Debate
item.description: Zohran Mamdani, Andrew Cuomo and Curtis Sliwa traded barbs over the police, prostitution and President Trump.

item.title: U.S. Says Louisiana Man Joined Hamas-Led 2023 Attack on Israel
item.description: A man was in custody after federal prosecutors accused him of joining Gazan militants in attacking Israel on Oct. 7, 2023. He was also accused of lyin...

item.title: The Top Zingers of the Mayoral Debate
item.description: The two-hour slugfest produced some memorable one-liners, on subjects ranging from the candidates’ parents to imaginary sports championships.

item.title: What Are Tomahawk Missiles, and Why Might Trump Give Them to Ukraine?
item.description: Ukraine could receive a newly developed land-based launcher to strike Moscow and beyond.

item.title: Tomiichi Murayama, Japanese Leader Who Gave War Apology, Dies at 101
